Eastwood.Contents.Subject.World Food Supplies ....Bread Rationing.[32426-1]Page214 The Cabinet considered the proposed adoption of bread rationing in this country, in the light of the latest information,contained in a telegram (AMAZE 7488) from the British food mission in Washington, about the prospects of the North Americanwheat crop.The Cabinet's discussion is recorded in the Secretary's standard file of Cabinet Conclusions.The Cabinet (1) Reaffirmed their decision that bread rationing should beintroduced forthwith.(2) Agreed that the information given in telegram AMAZE7488 should be published.Cabinet Office, S.W. 1,21st July, 1946.bread rationing.(previous reference:CM.
